Trade-in for up to 500 yuan subsidy | Click to learn more about selected phones >> Ultra-clear dual mirror screens | Ultra-lightweight quad-foldable design.

string.name: discount_info
string.value: Enjoy up to 12 installments with 0% interest.

string.name: faq_data_answer_1
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 features two-way Beidou satellite messaging, enabling message transmission without ground network signals, ensuring secure two-way communication between sender and receiver.

string.name: faq_data_answer_2
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports up to 66W (11V/6A) super fast charging, compatible with 10V/4A, 10V/2.25A, 4.5V/5A, or 5V/4.5A super fast charging, and 9V/2A fast charging; also supports 50W Huawei wireless super fast charging.

string.name: faq_data_answer_3
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5's dual screens support air gesture control, enabling screenshot and scroll operations with gestures.

string.name: faq_data_answer_4
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports Camera Toolbox, allowing quick access to enable or disable camera features.

string.name: faq_data_answer_5
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports the Adaptive UI Engine, which is Huawei's original large-screen page layout optimization solution, effectively enhancing the overall visual experience.

string.name: faq_data_answer_6
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports 3D dynamic weather display, which can be set to the weather display, which is more convenient to check the weather.

string.name: faq_data_answer_7
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports Huawei sharing, allowing you to quickly share files such as pictures, videos, and documents wirelessly between devices that support this function.

string.name: faq_data_answer_8
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 internal and external screen front single-camera 8 megapixel camera (F2.4 aperture), 50 megapixel super sensing camera +13 megapixel super wide Angle camera +12 megapixel hidden telephoto camera.

string.name: faq_data_answer_9
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports 7.5W wireless reverse charging, which can charge devices that support wireless charging.

string.name: faq_data_answer_10
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 supports face payment. After entering the face information, secure payment can be made through the face.

string.name: faq_data_answer_11
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 is equipped with the industry's large 5060mAh (typical value) high-silicon negative maximum battery, which brings greater energy density and makes the battery life better

string.name: faq_data_answer_12
string.value: HUAWEI Mate X5 features an OLED external screen and a foldable flexible OLED internal screen. With Huawei's immersive display technology, both screens deliver excellent color accuracy and true-to-life brightness, creating an exceptional display experience for a foldable phone.

string.name: home_recommend_info_2
string.value: Beidou Satellite Message | Low Battery Emergency Mode

string.name: home_recommend_feature_2
string.value: A new generation of straight screen flagship
